title: Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) - GatewayClass capabilities
abstract:
# Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) - GatewayClass capabilities
This page lists the capabilities of the [GatewayClass](/kubernetes-engine/docs/concepts/gateway-api#gateway_resources) resources available on Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) and their supported specifications.
For the various tables in this document, the legend for the tables is as follows:
- indicates that the field is supported.
- `-`indicates that the field is not supported.
- If GKE supports some values in the field, the table describes what values are supported.
content:
## GatewayClass capabilities
The following table lists the distinguishing features of the GatewayClass resources available on GKE.
### Architecture
| Feature    | gke-l7-global-external-managed                                             | gke-l7-global-external-managed-mc                                            | gke-l7-regional-external-managed                                            | gke-l7-regional-external-managed-mc                                            | gke-l7-rilb                                                  | gke-l7-rilb-mc                                                 | gke-l7-gxlb                                                  | gke-l7-gxlb-mc                                                 |

| GKE Gateway Controller | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            | Google-hosted Gateway controller                                            |

## Supported Gateway API Fields
The following tables list the fields of the [Gateway API specification](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/references/spec/#gateway.networking.k8s.io%2fv1beta1.Gateway) that are supported by GKE.
### Gateway
For more information, see [spec.addresses](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/references/spec/#gateway.networking.k8s.io/v1beta1.GatewayAddress) in the Gateway documentation.

| value | Static global external address | Static global external address  | Static regional external address | Static regional external address  | Static regional internal address | Static regional internal address | Static global external address | Static global external address |
